lines.text: Why did you change your handle from Lullaby to Alibi?
Aw... prepraredness, Dusty. You see, Elmer here gets me into so many stampeded, heck, I have to do something to fall back on, so I use Alibi.

[offering to cook some food]
Are you hungry?
No, that bullet must have took away my appetite!
Oh, Elmer, I'm worried! I can't make head or tails of this set-up!
You wouldn't know one end from the other anyhow.
Aw, listen, you oughtn't to talk like that. Haven't you no respect for age?
Only when it comes in bottles.
WE'LL BE SEEING YOU IN OUR NEXT PICTURE Crash, Dusty, and Alibi, The Range Busters.
